aws_cloudhsm_v2_hsm.description: Provides a CloudHSM v2 HSM module resource.

cluster_id.description: The ID of Cloud HSM v2 cluster to which HSM will be added.

subnet_id.description: The ID of subnet in which HSM module will be located.

availability_zone.description: The IDs of AZ in which HSM module will be located. Do not use together with subnet_id.

ip_address.description: The IP address of HSM module. Must be within the CIDR of selected subnet.

hsm_id.description: The id of the HSM module.

hsm_state.description: The state of the HSM module.

hsm_eni_id.description: The id of the ENI interface allocated for HSM module.
